original_title: CID arrests Bruno Divakara over Nathasha Edirisooriya’s remarks
original_body_lines: Bruno Divakara, who claims to be the owner of SLVLOG,  has been arrested for aiding and abetting Nathasha Edirisooriya, who has been remanded for making comments disrespectful to Buddhism.
Police said the Criminal Investigation Department arrested him today after recording an over 08-hour long statement regarding the investigations into Nathasha Edirisooriya's remarks.
Preliminary investigations conducted by police have revealed that the person in question has allegedly aided and abetted to publish remarks that harm religious freedom through YouTube channel.
